mapper.insert: insert into biology_species(uuid, name_cn, name_latin, point1, point2, point3, point4, point5, create_time, update_time, user_uuid, family_uuid) VALUES (#{uuid}, #{nameCn}, #{nameLatin}, #{point1}, #{point2}, #{point3}, #{point4}, #{point5}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{userUuid}, #{familyUuid})
mapper.select: SELECT uuid, name_cn, name_latin, create_time, update_time, family_uuid, user_uuid, point1, point2, point3, point4, point5 FROM biology_species WHERE family_uuid = #{familyUuid} ORDER BY create_time
